name: RC-ESC
tagline: Electronic stability control for remote-control cars
body:
### Welcome to the RC-ESC project
This projects aim is to create an electronic stability control for a 1/10th scale RC car. The targetted car is a nitro-powered RC-car, but any 1/10th scale RC car is compatible with the project that has a throttle and a steering servo. This is my first public project, I have been tinkering with electronics and programming for quite some time.  Detailed description of the project is in the .ino file itself. I am constantly uploading content to give as much detail as possible, so if you are interested check back every now and then. **Last update: 2016-04-14**

### Current stage
I managed to solve a problem with the I2C communication between the two arduinos (that I had for two weeks now), so now I am turning towards programming the remote control, so I can set sensitivity settings and everything from the remote. If that's done, I need a housing for it and tests can begin. :) Pictures of the remote coming soon.
